welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Taylors, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, delicious food, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The primary terminal for commercial flights at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Donaldson Center Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Donaldson Center Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pickens Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pickens Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
